column4: hey what's a good pdf viewer? better than the default, i mean
Better in what ways? What is your problem with Evince?
evince then? mine's 'document viewer' and it seems a bit simple

Evince is the name of the default viewer. (They call it `Document Viewer' because that's what it does. I don't know of any pdf viewers that are more feature-rich than Evince. You could try Adobe's Reader, which might be.
